hero.subtitle: Launch your ads easily on all major channels, watch them optimize automatically and get the best results for your business.

features.title: No expertise or huge budget needed
features.description: New to online advertising? Learn how Shown can help you achieve your advertising goals without the high costs of traditional solutions.

first.content: I started using Shown for my business and I'm very satisfied. Special thanks to the support team for helping me!

second.content: Shown is like a digital marketing expert sitting next to me and saving me time by doing all the manual work!

third.content: I used Shown to advertise my solo business. I got excellent results and I'm happy with the automated tool and support plan.

performance.title: High-performing ads. Easily.
performance.description: Create your ad campaigns like the biggest brands in minutes. Discover the power of automation.

automation.title: Shown does all the work for you.
automation.description: Shown handles everything, from ad targeting and copywriting to creating ad materials.

platforms.title: Publish on all major ad platforms.
platforms.description: We support all major advertising platforms to bring the best ROI.

optimization.title: Get 24/7 ad optimization
optimization.description: Shown will optimize your ads around the clock across all channels. From pausing unsuccessful keywords, creating new ads for A/B testing or suggesting new targeting, Shown covers it all.
optimization.abTesting: Create new ads for A/B testing

dashboard.description: View your ad campaign performance or import your existing campaigns for a unified data source. Compare channels, campaigns, and ads at a glance.

overview.title: View your campaign performance...
overview.description: Create your campaigns from the dashboard, manage them, and get an overview of their performance and channels.

decisions.title: ...and make better data-driven decisions
decisions.description: Monitor your campaign performance and get detailed insights about each one.

budget.title: Manage all budgets from one place
budget.description: With Shown credit, you can easily manage budgets across all ad platforms and earn extra credit with each spend.

integration.description: Integrate your different applications and sync all your valuable assets, such as email lists and product lists, to create profitable ads.
